title: In the "Files by Google" app, how do I get Adobe Acrobat Reader to show up in the "Open with" list?
content:
This issue is 100% repeatable on my Pixel 3XL, as follows:

Open the default "Files" app (Files by Google 1.0.297653579)
Go to the downloads folder.
Tap on a PDF file.
"Open with" panel slides up with only two options: Drive PDF viewer and Adobe Digital Editions. 

I want Adobe Acrobat Reader to also show up as an option, but it does not. How do I fix this? 

Observations: 
I've cleared all defaults in all three apps (Adobe Reader, Digital Editions, and Files). 
I can open the same file with Adobe Acrobat Reader if I first open that app, navigate to the file, and open it. 
A third-party app called "Solid Explorer" provides a more complete list of "Open with" options, including Adobe Acrobat Reader. Therefore, this may be a bug with the "Files by Google" app.
